targets.expr: count(count by (envId, alertname, severity) (ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="error"} or ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"trace_files",severity="error"})) * sum(otcs_resource_trace_files_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or vector(0)

sum by (severity, alertname, componentId, systemId, envId) (ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) 
ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})

count(ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"}  unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) by (systemId, envId) or 0 * count(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]",}) by (systemId, envId)

sum(count by (systemId, alertname, severity) (count_over_time(ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",severity="warning",envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]", systemId!~""}[${overviewChartBarInterval}])) OR count by (systemId, alertname, severity) (count_over_time(ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",adminAlert!="true",severity="warning",envId=~"[[envId]]",systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${overviewChartBarInterval}])))

sum(count by (systemId, alertname, severity) (count_over_time(ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",severity="error",envId=~"[[envId]]", systemId=~"[[systemId]]", systemId!~""}[${overviewChartBarInterval}])) OR count by (systemId, alertname, severity) (count_over_time(ALERTS{alertname!~"__.*",severity="error",envId=~"[[envId]]",systemId=~"[[systemId]]"}[${overviewChartBarInterval}])))

sort_desc(sum by (envId, componentName) (topk(5, sum by (envId, componentName) (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type))))) or sort_desc(sum by (envId, componentName) (label_replace(sum  (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type)) - sum (topk(5, sum by (envId, componentName) (max(max_over_time(otcs_content_status_size{envId=~"[[envId]]",}[1d])) by (envId, componentName, type)))),"componentName","Other","componentName",  "(.*)")) > 0)

sum(max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]", name="activeWorkflows"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) / (sum((max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) > 0)) or (vector(0))

sum(max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]", name="finishedWorkflows"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) / (sum((max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) > 0)) or (vector(0))

sum(max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]", name="archivedWorkflows"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) / (sum((max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) > 0)) or (vector(0))

sum(max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]", name="deletedUsersTasks"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) / (sum((max_over_time(otcs_workflows_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d]) and on(envId) max_over_time(otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"}[1d])) > 0)) or (vector(0))

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_active{envId=~"[[envId]]"} unless on(envId, componentClass) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0) + count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}
)) or vector(0)

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_active{envId=~"[[envId]]"} unless on(envId, componentClass) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"sov_admserv_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)

sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or sum(count by (envId) (otcs_sov_processes_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_running{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

(sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_total{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or sum(count by (envId) (otcs_sov_processes_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)) - (sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_admserv_processes_running{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0))

sum( max by (envId) (otcs_sov_partition_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) and on (envId) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass=~"partition|search_federator",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)

sum( max by (envId) (otcs_sov_partition_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) unless on (envId) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass=~"partition|search_federator",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_ipool_pending{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) ((otcs_sov_ipool_quarantined{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) > 0)) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId, alertname, severity) (ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="error"} or ALERTS{envId=~"[[envId]]",alertname=~"sov_ipool_quarantined",severity="error"})) * sum(count by (envId) ((otcs_sov_ipool_quarantined{envId=~"[[envId]]"}) > 0)) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"da_agent_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)

count(count by (envId) (ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"} or ALERTS{alertname=~"da_worker_.*",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_backlog{envId=~"[[envId]]"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_queued{envId=~"[[envId]]"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId) (otcs_da_queue_processed{envId=~"[[envId]]"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",severity="error",envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",severity="warning",envId=~"[[envId]]"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_loaderprocess_alive{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_loaderprocess_alive{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_loaderprocess_alive{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
sum by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_partition_available{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
sum by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_partition_size_content{envId=~"[[envId]]"} * 100)
sum by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_sov_partition_size_metadata{envId=~"[[envId]]"} * 100)
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_agent_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="da_worker",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_da_worker_status{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{envId=~"[[envId]]"})

count by (componentId, componentName, componentClass) (ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="warning"} unless ignoring (severity) ALERTS{alertname!~"^__.*$",componentClass="agent",envId=~"[[envId]]",severity="error"}) or 0 * count by (componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otcs_agent_activated{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_read_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="RDBMS"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_write_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="RDBMS"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_read_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="ENTERPRISEARCHIVE"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_write_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="ENTERPRISEARCHIVE"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_read_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="EXTSHARED"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
avg by (componentId) (otcs_storage_provider_write_throughput{envId=~"[[envId]]", type="EXTSHARED"} and on(envId) otcs_heartbeat_up{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
max by (envId, systemId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_archive_total_pools{envId=~"[[envId]]"})
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_original_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_original_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_replicated_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_replicated_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_external_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)
sum(max by (envId, componentId, componentName, componentClass) (otac_external_archives_count{envId=~"[[envId]]"})) or vector(0)

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from environment
list.label: Environment
list.name: envId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from environment

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system
list.label: System
list.name: systemId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system where app_type='OTCS'
list.label: OTCS
list.name: otcsId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system where app_type='OTCS'

list.definition: select id as __value, name as __text from system where app_type='OTAC'
list.label: OTAC
list.name: otacId
list.query: select id as __value, name as __text from system where app_type='OTAC'
